LanguageData.Bullet_Bulldog.label: Bulldog
LanguageData.Bullet_C20r.label: C20r Bullet
LanguageData.Bullet_L6LMG.label: L6 LMG
LanguageData.Bullet_M90gl.label: M90gl Bullet
LanguageData.Bullet_SaberSMG.label: Saber SMG
LanguageData.Bullet_Syndipistol.label: Stetchkin Bullet
LanguageData.Bullet_Syndivolver.label: Syndicate Revolver Bullet
LanguageData.Gun_Bulldog.label: Bulldog Shotgun
LanguageData.Gun_Bulldog.description: The Bulldog shotgun is the best close quarters weapon the Syndicate has access to, lightweight, automatic and deadly to anything on the other end of the barrel it's still commonly utilized by space and ground strike teams alike.
LanguageData.Gun_Bulldog.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Bulldog Shotgun
LanguageData.Gun_C20r.label: C20r
LanguageData.Gun_C20r.description: This lightweight, compact bullpup rifle chambered in a devistating 12mm. This gun is the bread and butter of any Syndicate assault team due to its ability to fire in space and its compact size.
LanguageData.Gun_C20r.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: C20r
LanguageData.Gun_L6LMG.label: L6 LMG
LanguageData.Gun_L6LMG.description: Effective at mowing down squishy humanoids and fortifications, The L6 SMG is a deadly weapon capable of decimating entire platoons of infantry, however the size of the ammunition cartridges makes the user vulnerable when reloading.
LanguageData.Gun_L6LMG.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: L6 LMG
LanguageData.Gun_M90gl.label: M90gl
LanguageData.Gun_M90gl.description: A Lightweight, compact top feed rifle chambered in 5.56. This advanced rifle is prefered by the most elite Syndicate strike teams due to its stopping power and undermounted grenade launcher. *disclaimer* Grenade launcher may be disabled for planetary missions due to Ordinance Restriction Ordinance chapter 12 paragraph 3.
LanguageData.Gun_M90gl.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: M90gl
LanguageData.Gun_SaberSMG.label: Prototype Saber SMG
LanguageData.Gun_SaberSMG.description: A prototype SMG weapon stolen from a high tech Nanotrasen Research Facility, because of their heavy manafacturing costs involving Nanotrasen holding a monopoly on Solid Plasma deposits there are very few circulating Syndicate posession and those that are can be very expensive.
LanguageData.Gun_SaberSMG.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Prototype Saber SMG
LanguageData.Gun_Stetchkin.label: Stetchkin Pistol
LanguageData.Gun_Stetchkin.description: Often used by covert operatives or desperate Strike teams strapped on Telecrystals, this pistol operates as a trustworthy sidearm and an effective primary weapon.
LanguageData.Gun_Stetchkin.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Stetchkin Pistol
LanguageData.Gun_Syndivolver.label: Syndicate Revolver
LanguageData.Gun_Syndivolver.description: This simple .357 Revolver is a truly feared weapon. While it lacks in range, it makes up for as a devestating close range weapon, prefered by assassins and traitors due to it's simplicity, reliability, concealability and close range stopping power. This space friendly weapon will guarantee anyone within 10 meters is going to have a bad day.
LanguageData.Gun_Syndivolver.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Syndicate Revolver
LanguageData.Proj_Minibomb.label: Syndicate Minibomb
LanguageData.Weapon_Minibomb.label: Syndicate Minibombs
LanguageData.Weapon_Minibomb.description: A Syndicate payload in the form of a small throwable capsule.
